meanings.sent1: The poetesses gathered to share their verses at the literary event.
meanings.sent2: Many poetesses have contributed beautiful poems to the anthology.
meanings.sent3: The poetesses decided to have a poetry slam competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her words danced like butterflies, painting the world with colors, a true poetess.
meanings.sent5: The poetesses' words flowed like a gentle stream, soothing the soul of the listeners.

meanings.sent1: In the library, you can find a section dedicated to poetesses and their works.
meanings.sent2: Some poetesses prefer to write in the early morning when the world is still quiet.
meanings.sent3: The group of poetesses giggled as they penned silly limericks together.
meanings.sent4: She weaved emotions into her poems like a skilled poetess crafting a tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The poetesses' verses sparkled with creativity, lighting up the room with inspiration.
